content: झषः {@--1@} A fish in general; झषाणां मकरश्चास्मि <ls>Bg. 10. 31</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> words like झषकेतन below. {@--2@} A large fish. {@--3@} The sign Pisces of the zodiac. {@--4@} Heat, warmth. {@--5@} The sign Capricornus of the zodiac. --षं {@--1@} A forest, wood. {@--2@} A desert, dreary forest.
